title: Fruit of the Loom Men's EverSoft Cotton Sleeveless Moisture Wicking T-Shirts with Odor Control
description: Eversoft fabric provides premium softness wash after wash

Whether you’re going to gym, or you and your friends decide to throw the ball around, the Fruit of the Loom 360 Breathe muscle or tank has your back. These great sleeveless shirts include EverSoft fabric for premium softness, and wicking and odor protection. Stay confident knowing that Fruit of the Loom is obsessing over the smallest details of quality, performance, fit and comfort so you are free to focus on what matters most to you.
